common.browser-not-supported: It seems your browser is not supported. Some of the features may not work.

status-message.default-message_warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
status-message.default-message_info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that

validation.failed: Please fill out all the fields before continuing
validation.field-error_email: This field should be a valid email
validation.field-error_seed: This field should be a valid secret seed
validation.field-error_validateUrl: This field should be a valid website URL
validation.field-error_integer: This field should be a valid integer
validation.field-error_minValue: This field should be more or equal {{minValue, number}}
validation.field-error_amount: Amount must be a number, greater than {{ minValue, number }}
validation.field-error_maxValue: Value should be less than {{maxValue, number}}
validation.field-error_decimal: Allowed integer or decimal numbers only
validation.field-error_amountRange: Amount should be in the range from {{from, money}} to {{to, money}}
validation.field-error_accountId: This field should be a valid account ID
validation.field-error_address: Make sure the address is correct
validation.field-error_maxLength: This field must contain maximum {{length}} symbols
validation.field-error_cardNumber: Make sure the card number is correct
validation.field-error_noMoreThanSaleCap: Provided amount has exceeded the goal {{saleCap, money}}
validation.field-error_alphaNum: Value should consists of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_minLength: This field must contain minimum {{minLength}} symbols
validation.field-error_selectedSameAssetCode: Not allowed duplicated quote asset codes
validation.field-error_validatePhoneNumber: Make sure the phone number is correct
validation.field-error_emailOrPhoneNumber: This field should be a valid email or phone number
validation.field-error_cryptoAddressOrCreditCardNum: This field should be valid {{ destinationLabel, lowercase }}

errors.default: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.server: This service is temporary unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Timeout exceeded. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.internal: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.bad-request: The request you sent is invalid in some way.
errors.not-allowed: Your account don't have permissions to perform this request.
errors.user-exists: User with such email already exists.
errors.transaction: The transaction you sent is invalid.
errors.user-doesnt-exist: This user doesn't exist in system.
errors.balance-not-found: The user does not have this asset balance yet.
errors.file-upload: Cannot upload a file to the storage. Please upload another file or try again later.

supported-browsers.title: Browsers that support all of our features
supported-browsers.description: Looks like your current browser cannot support some of our features. You need to update your current browser or download browser that supports all of our features by following links below.

transaction-errors.tx_insufficient_fee: The total fee amount is greater than the max fee amount specified by tx source
transaction-errors.tx_source_underfunded: Not enough funds for tx fee
transaction-errors.tx_commission_line_full: Charging tx fee would cause uint64 overflow

transaction-errors.op_bad_auth: You don’t have permission to complete this action

transaction-errors.op_account_type_mismatched: Wrong account type in operation. Refresh page and try again
transaction-errors.op_invalid_destination: Source id matches with destination account id

transaction-errors.op_invalid_weight: Weight must not be bigger than 1000
transaction-errors.op_no_signer_data: There must be at least one signer for new account
transaction-errors.op_role_is_used: Not allowed to remove role which is used
transaction-errors.op_rule_id_duplication: Not allowed to set equal rule ids
transaction-errors.op_range_overlap: Range you entered overlapped with another one. Delete or reduce an old one before creating new
transaction-errors.op_no_such_role: Creating account with not existing role not allowed

transaction-errors.op_invalid_pre_issuer: New pre issuer public key is the same as existing
transaction-errors.op_balance_mismatch: Asset of balance and asset of operation are not equal

transaction-errors.op_stats_asset_already_exists: It can be only one stats asset in the system
transaction-errors.op_line_full: Payment would cause a destination account to exceed their declared trust limit for the asset being sent

transaction-errors.op_balance_assets_mismatched: Asset of balance and asset of operation are not equal
transaction-errors.op_reference_duplication: You cannot make two issuances with the same reference

transaction-errors.op_not_allowed_by_asset_policy: This action is not allowed by asset policy

transaction-errors.op_invalid_cap: Soft cap should not exceed Hard cap
transaction-errors.op_insufficient_max_issuance: Asset’s max issuance amount is insufficient to fulfill soft cap

tfa-form.qr-desc: Scan the QR with your 2FA app. We recommend Google Authenticator for most users. It doesn’t require an internet connection or phone service to use, and is more secure than SMS due to being offline and local to your device.

tfa-form.tfa-code-desc: And enter your 2FA code to continue

mass-payment-form.how-to-receivers-paragraph: List all receivers emails in the box below. Each receiver will gain the amount you specified in the “Amount” field. If the available amount is insufficient the operation will fail and no asset will be issued to anyone. Not found users and the ones that do not have balance in the selected asset will not receive the issuance but all the others will. Receivers number is limited up to 100 for now.
mass-payment-form.no-assets-msg-description: Unfortunately, you do not have any assets now, please create an asset and try again.
mass-payment-form.no-receivers-found: Receivers you provided not found or cannot receive the send. Please ensure you specified the valid receivers list and try again.
mass-payment-form.overpayment-error-notif: The total amount is bigger than the available for send amount. Please decrease the amount to send and try again.
mass-payment-form.too-much-op-error-notif: Too many receivers, the current limit is 100 receivers, please decrease the receivers count and try again.

mass-invitation-form.how-to-invitees-paragraph: List all invitees emails in the box below.
mass-invitation-form.no-invitees-found: Receivers you provided not found or cannot receive the invitation. Please ensure you specified the valid receivers list and try again.

customers-table.no-data-msg: You have no associated customers yet. Invite some and they will appear in this list.
customers-table.error-msg: An error occurred while loading the list, please contact system owner to resolve the issue.

businesses-all.no-list-msg: Here will be the list of businesses

businesses-my.no-list-msg: Here will be the list of businesses associated with you
